```{r}

totals <- population_zaf %>%
  filter(year == 2013) %>%
  select(province, total)

compare_provinces <- mortality_zaf %>%
  left_join(totals) %>%
  mutate(rate = deaths/total *1000) %>%
  group_by(province, indicator) %>%
  summarise(ave_rate=mean(rate)) %>%
  spread(indicator, ave_rate)


```
